forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High around 70F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 21C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 78F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 26C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partial cloudiness early, with scattered showers and thunderstorms later during the night. Low 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partial cloudiness early, with scattered showers and thunderstorms later during the night. Low 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 74F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 23C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy with late night showers or thunderstorms. Low 63F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy with a chance of thunderstorms. Low 17C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning will give way to partly cloudy skies late. High 78F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the morning, then partly cloudy late. High 26C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms in the evening, then mainly cloudy overnight with thunderstorms likely. Low 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms during the evening becoming more widespread overnight. Low 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
